page.title: 16Alf Strange. Blacksmith.
page.content: Alf Strange can make almost anything out of iron as he is a blacksmith. He started work at the age of fourteen, 46 years ago, and had 7 years training. Nothing in Alf's smithy works by electricity, it is all hand powered.He has a lot of imteresting horse shoes but he has not made them all himself. His oldest horse shoe is about 600 years old. He could make about 24 shoes in one day, which would shoe six horses. He makes pokers and lots of other iron things as well. He has to pump the bellows while the iron is in the fire. When you pump the bellows it sends more oxygen into the fire to make it burn more fiercely. When the iron is red hot he stops pumping the bellows. Alf says that in a few years blacksmiths will only be able to fit horseshoes not make them.
